audioText: Ce mercredi, aux alentours de 21 heures, la capitale a subi un orage aussi intense que bref. Une pluie violente et un vent tout aussi puissant ont causé des dégâts, pour l'heure légers.
question: What does the speaker say about the storm that hit the capital?
options: It lasted several hours with moderate intensity
It was very intense but short-lived
It caused major damage throughout the city
It brought only light rain and gentle winds
explanation: The text states 'Ce mercredi, aux alentours de 21 heures, la capitale a subi un orage aussi intense que bref. Une pluie violente et un vent tout aussi puissant ont causé des dégâts, pour l'heure légers.' - This Wednesday, around 9 PM, the capital experienced a storm as intense as it was brief. Violent rain and an equally powerful wind caused damage, minor for now. The distractors test misinterpretation of duration (lasted several hours), misinterpretation of damage severity (major damage), and misinterpretation of storm intensity (light rain and gentle winds).
